attributes.action: Mark Friday 11th November 2011 a national day of mourning in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i wish that the prime minister make friday 11th november 2011 a national holiday.
this date will be very unique and will only happen once in our life time.
when this country falls silent on that date to remember those who sadly lost their lives fighting for their country the clocks will show the time as 11:11 and the date will show as 11/11/11.
i feel that many millions will feel strongly about this and look forward to the prime minister allowing this petition to pass and make it a national holiday

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
